ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Paul J. Pearlman ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. PAUL J. PEARLMAN, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective May 7, 2018.
